summary: Completed testing of Employee Access Management, Attendance Summary, and Leave Management features - All requested features verified working correctly

details: Employee Permissions page at /employee-permissions loads correctly
Page shows 'Employee Access Management' title
Employee list shows 11 employees with names, employee IDs, and Active/No Access badges
Search and department filter functionality available
Reporting Manager dropdown shows list of 11 employees when clicked
Dropdown includes employee name and employee ID for each option
Format: 'Employee Name (EMP001)'
None option available for employees with no manager
Pending Approval Requests (1) section visible to admin
Shows request details: employee name, requester, date
Approve and Reject buttons present and functional
HR users can submit changes that require admin approval
Employee Permissions link visible in Admin section of sidebar
Uses data-testid='nav-employee-permissions'
Navigates to /employee-permissions correctly
Attendance page at /attendance loads without errors
Shows employee attendance summary table
Table columns: Emp ID, Name, Department, Present, Absent, Half Day, WFH, Leave, Total
Data shows per-employee breakdown (1 employee with attendance data)
Summary and Daily Records tabs available
Month picker for date selection
Mark Attendance and Bulk Upload buttons for HR
Leave Management page at /leave-management loads correctly
Shows LEAVE MANAGEMENT title
Displays pending/approved/rejected counts
Shows leave requests table with Type, From, To, Days, Reason, Status columns
My Requests and All Requests tabs available

critical_code_review_comments: EmployeePermissions.js: Well-structured with proper data-testid attributes for testing
Attendance.js: fetchData function correctly parses month/year for API calls
Backend attendance.py: /summary endpoint returns per-employee breakdown correctly
Layout.js: Employee Permissions link properly added to Admin section
context_for_next_testing_agent: Employee Permissions page fully functional with employee list, Reporting Manager dropdown showing all employees, HR->Admin approval workflow with Approve/Reject buttons. Attendance page shows per-employee summary table. Leave Management shows leave requests. All APIs tested and working.
